word:
The heavenly intelligences are waiting to cooperate with the human agent in reshaping his character according to the divine model. Will the human agent do his God-given work, or will he bend all his efforts toward 


                                   -129- 

shaping the character after the worldly pattern? See 1 Corinthians 1:3-8--Letter 47, 1893, pp. 3, 5-9. (To W. W. Prescott, October 25, 1893.) 

Released April 16, 1974.
